name: memorize_information
description: This function stores information in a file. It is useful to store large amounts of information for later retrieval. It serves as a memory.

args.name: information
args.description: A string representing the information to be stored.
args.example_value: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth, upon this continent, a new nation, conceived in liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. [...]

return_value.description: A string representing the name of the file where the information was stored.
